# hyperping_monitor_reports (Data Source)

Fetches SLA and outage reports for all Hyperping monitors.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `from` (String) Start of reporting period (ISO 8601). Defaults to 7 days ago.
- `to` (String) End of reporting period (ISO 8601). Defaults to now.

### Read-Only

- `monitors` (Attributes List) List of monitor reports. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--monitors))

<a id="nestedatt--monitors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `monitors`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) The UUID of the monitor.
- `mttr` (Number) Mean time to recovery in seconds.
- `mttr_formatted` (String) Human-readable mean time to recovery (e.g. "35min 16s").
- `name` (String) The name of the monitor.
- `outage_count` (Number) Total number of outages in the reporting period.
- `protocol` (String) The protocol of the monitor.
- `sla` (Number) Uptime percentage for the reporting period (e.g. 99.95).
- `total_downtime` (Number) Total downtime in seconds.
- `total_downtime_formatted` (String) Human-readable total downtime (e.g. "2min 0s").
